comment.body:
The world is falling, we need to burning the world, TO BE SURE.

1.Burning the world, To Be Sure.


2.Do not eat medicine, Do not go to hospital, Do not take any test.


3.When you meet your brother of Sure, Do not take any electronic set.


4.Do not eat any things only few people could get.


5.Do not trust any body not of Sure, Trust Your Master.


6.Do not fake your brother of Sure, otherwise Cut you into parts.
